system.description: When you want to know something about someone important (your call), roll+hot.

failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, ask 1 anyway, but they hear about your interest in them.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value: On a hit, you can ask the MC questions. On a 7-9, ask 1.

success.label: Success
success.value: On a hit, you can ask the MC questions. On a 10+, ask 3.

system.choices:
• How are they doing? What’s up with them?
  • What or who do they love best?
  • Who do they know, like and/or trust?
  • When next should I expect to see them?
  • How could I get to them, physically or emotionally?
